thread.title: Warner Bros. Is Reportedly Rebooting ‘The Matrix’ And People Are Pissed
thread.title_full: Warner Bros. Is Reportedly Rebooting ‘The Matrix’ And People Are Pissed

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Warner Bros. Is Reportedly Rebooting ‘The Matrix’ And People Are Pissed
text:
Before MSNBC’s big Trump tax return revelal, The Hollywood Reporter dropped a huge bomb when they reported that Warner Bros. was in the early stages of rebooting The Matrix . 
Via The Hollywood Reporter 
sources tell The Hollywood Reporter that Warner Bros. is in the early stages of developing a relaunch of The Matrix, the iconic 1999 sci-fi movie that is considered one of the most original films in cinematic history, with Zak Penn in talks to write a treatment.
Sources say there is potential interest in Michael B. Jordan to star, but much must be done before the project is ready to go. 
People did not take the news well. 
"Warner Bros. in early talks to reboot The Matrix." pic.twitter.com/rxMy6RClzQ 
— Charles Lai (@comtar) March 15, 2017 
"Warner Bros. in early talks to reboot The Matrix." pic.twitter.com/rxMy6RClzQ 
— Charles Lai (@comtar) March 15, 2017 


The moment you find out that Warner Bros. wants to reboot The Matrix… #DoNotRebootTheMat … https://t.co/mBNQ05DfMF pic.twitter.com/XIKmcINxZy 
— Brian Mazzarella (@MazzEffect7) March 15, 2017 
I know I'm a fogey but is The Matrix old enough to merit a reboot? When do we start becoming nostalgic for last week?
— Adam Sessler (@AdamSessler) March 15, 2017 


dont let Trump's taxes distract u from the fact that they really out here tryna reboot The Matrix
— ️ (@AiiGod) March 15, 2017 
Hollywood is rebooting The Matrix. pic.twitter.com/NXVqLs4g5c 
— Clayton TheGIFGuy (@IGIF_) March 15, 2017 


Dear @wbpictures , if you reboot the Matrix, I will actively campaign against it. For years. Don't do it. Just fix Batman, you idiots.
— cinemasins (@cinemasins) March 15, 2017 
"THE MATRIX reboot in the works" pic.twitter.com/Z1I7tGBbj1 
— Memoirs of A MallCop (@ALittleResolve) March 15, 2017 
"sources tell The Hollywood Reporter that Warner Bros. is in the early stages of developing a relaunch of The Matrix" pic.twitter.com/2su8hdMBHU 
— Luke Plunkett (@LukePlunkett) March 15, 2017 

Please Warner Bros don’t do this.
